抴字的基本解释

抴
yè
同“曳”。

抴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《廣韻》羊列切，入薛，章。］
(1)牵引，拉。
(2)连缀。
(3)通“枻”。短桨。一说，为绑弓的器具。

抴字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抴； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页423第11
【唐韻】余制切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】以制切，?音裔。【說文】捈也。【廣韻】引也。【荀子·非相篇】接人則用抴。【註】牽引而致之。　又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】羊列切【正韻】延結切，?曳入聲。拖也。或作拽。　又【集韻】食列切，音舌。同揲。見揲字註。

抴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
抴字的起名意思

暂无。

抴
Basic explanation of words
抴
yè
Same as "trolling".
抴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Guangyun" sheep column cut, into Xue, chapter. ]
(1) Traction, pull.
(2) Concatenation.
(3) Through "枻". Scull. Firstly, it is an instrument for tying a bow.
抴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　抴; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 423-11
[Tang Yun] Yu Zhiqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] to make cutting,? Yin Yi. [Said the text] Shu also. [Guang Yun] cited also. [Xunzi · Non-Photograph] Use 抴 for receiving people. [Note] It is caused by traction.　 [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Sheep Rhyme Cut [Zheng Yun] Extend the knot and cut,? Drag into the sound. Procrastinate. Or drag.　[Jiyun] Food row cut, sound tongue. Same 揲. See 揲字Note.
